name: Mediterranean-Twist Salmon
author: Honour232
summary: A little twist on your basic salmon recipe. It's healthy, delicious, and a real crowd pleaser! Make extra because everyone will want seconds! This recipe goes great over couscous. If you are like me and love tomatoes, add 1 cup instead of 1/2 cup.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped tomatoes, or more to taste
directions: Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat
Cook salmon in the hot oil until cooked through and flakes easily with a fork, 5 to 7 minutes per side
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a separate saucepan over medium heat; add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add tomatoes; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes
Pour balsamic vinegar into tomato mixture; add basil
Cook and stir tomato mixture until flavors blend, about 3 minutes
Place salmon on a plate and top with tomato sauce
